fullplot: In 1929, the film follows the six-year old son of a Swedish country doctor. èke lives with his parents and his sister Aja in a small provincial town. His best friend is Kalle Nubb. èke is very frightened of the janitor Bergstrèm as well as the lunatic Anne-Marie, his cousin who lives in the attic. There is also the strict principal Godeman as well as the religious cobbler Ebenholtz.
